mapper.insert:
insert into sys_system_dictionary
sys_system_dictionary.enum_name,
sys_system_dictionary.enum_type, sys_system_dictionary.sort_id, sys_system_dictionary.status,
sys_system_dictionary.system_id,

values
#{enumName},

mapper.update:
update sys_system_dictionary
sys_system_dictionary.enum_name = #{enumName},
sys_system_dictionary.enum_type = #{enumType},
sys_system_dictionary.sort_id = #{sortId},
sys_system_dictionary.status = #{status},
sys_system_dictionary.system_id = #{systemId},
sys_system_dictionary.text = #{text},
sys_system_dictionary.value = #{value}
where sys_system_dictionary.dicid = #{dicid}
